data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Chuan-Dong, He, Xuan-Ze, Gou, Guang-Qian (2018): Ophiorrhizaguizhouensis (Rubiaceae), a new species from Guizhou Province, southwestern China. PhytoKeys 95: 121-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.95.22506, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.95.22506
